name: approov-service-nsurlsession
description: Approov SDK integrates security attestation and secure string fetching for both iOS and watchOS apps.
prepare_command:
curl -L https://github.com/approov/approov-ios-sdk/releases/download/3.5.2/Approov.xcframework.zip > Approov.xcframework.zip
unzip -o Approov.xcframework.zip
rm -f Approov.xcframework.zip
